title: Video Evidence of Botting And Nothing Is Being Done
body:
These bots first got my attention when my post which had 5 upvotes was very quickly downvoted to -26

**Link to my first post that was botted**

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/VX26Nq2q-if-riot-wants-to-add-more-champion-to-the-jg-can-we-get-graves-back

Now this post was active for at least 5-6 hours before it was botted, in that time it had only recieved 5 upvotes and 3 comments. Yet, suddenly, despite requiring hours to only have 5 upvotes and 3 comments, it recieved 31 downvotes in a span of minutes if not seconds. Another curiosity is that when I checked the rest of the posts on the GD front page, suddenly at around the same time mine was, many many other posts were also brigaded.

Because of how quite the forums were for hours I found it very suspicious that all of a sudden dozens of posts were downvoted to hell. So, having previously heard about a botting problem, I was now convinced and I made a post about it. 

**Link to my second post that was also botted**

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/xs4UGdwJ-whats-up-with-the-vote-botting

Now, once again, the same story,  I made the post, it recieved 4 upvotes, not a lot of activity and then BAM instantly down to -27. However I discovered something very interesting, when I checked how much downvotes my second post got, it too same as my first post, had recieved **exactly** 31 downvotes in a matter of seconds.

**Evidence of both posts having exactly 31 downvotes**

https://imgur.com/a/4AXN6NG

I feel like I've caught onto something... So this made me curious.

I went to the front page and to the GD board and wanted to see if these posts that also recieved so many downvotes at the same time my posts did, also had exactly 31 downvotes.

And low and behold, I was shocked.

**VIDEO EVIDENCE RECORDED BY ME**

https://streamable.com/8ufqe

LINK IN COMMENTS FOR BETTER QUALITY

Clear, video evidence of many posts recieveing exactly 31 downvotes, what are the odds? You will also observe, some posts are negative but have only 8 or 5 downvotes, I believe these are natural and you'll notice the naturally downvoted posts have far, far less downvotes.

There is clearly, something happening here and it needs to be looked into by whoever needs to look into it because it's ridiculous.
